description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Synth Jam is an electronic music sandbox. Easily and intuitively improvise your own musical parts in real-time, with up to 4 players joining in on the fun! Record and play back your favorite Jam sessions. Features 4 original music pieces.
description.short: Synth Jam is an electronic music sandbox. Easily and intuitively improvise your own musical parts in real-time, with up to 4 players joining in on the fun! Record and play back your favorite Jam sessions. Features 4 original music pieces.
